log_name.description: The Windows logging subsystem. Ex: Channel=Security (xml) or LogName=Security (multiline)

log_version.description: The version of the event log template. Ex: Version=1 (xml). Note: Multiline formatted windows events do not record this attribute. For more information, refer to 'Event Versions' in this page.

provider.description: The service that logged the Windows event. Ex: Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing (xml) or Microsoft Windows security auditing. (multiline).
